website_summaries.verdict: A color LCD and an optional battery pack make this Epson snapshot printer a formidable portable photo lab.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Photo lab quality in a portable package.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer. I am an HP fan and have been for a long time... but this Epson PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition Photo Printer is fantastic! When you buy this be sure to buy the optional Battery... then just take this printer along where ever you go and you'll be the life of the party. The Quality is fantastic! The ink cartridge prints many more photos than advertised (A nice change indeed). The operation is simple and very straight forward (My seven year-old Daughter just loves it) With so many options built into this printer you may never hook it up to a computer. I can not praise this printer enough! Bravo Epson!
customer_reviews.author: James Hatsis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, prints excellent photos
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought this printer, and have been very pleased with the product. It prints very hight quality photos, and has a lot of editing options available, so you don't have to go to your computer first to edit. One drawback is, when we use a 1 gigabyte jmp drive, it searches the whole thing for photos, and this can take a while. At first we thought it wasn't working, but it found all the photos, even searching all the subdirectories. The printer is very easy to set up and very versatile, given that it prints up to 4x6 inch photos. So far, we're quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AmySuzanneJ

customer_reviews.title: Abusolutely a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer after looking at the many different types available. I have had several printers that say photo quality and have never been happy with them at all when trying to print photos. This printer has well exceeded my expectations in quality. The ease of getting started within 5 mins of getting it out of the packaging was also great. My photos have never looked better. The only thing I would like is more border options such as blurred edges and such. My husband who did not think this was a smart purchase loves this printer now.
customer_reviews.author: Rosepetal68

customer_reviews.title: Works Well But Know This . . .
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited about using this printer. It just arrived today and I printed one picture. The picture appears just as it should - bright, colorful, and looks like a quality print. This is much better than going to a store to have it printed. NOTE: I used two SanDisk SD memory cards and only one of them worked. After calling Epson technical support for this printer, I was informed by a helpful, knowledgeable representative that this printer cannot recognize SD cards over the capacity of 2.4 GB. So this card:didn't work in this machine. The other card I used was 2.0 GB. Other than that, this machine works quite well, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JoiB

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Fun & Quality Pics!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for x-mas and they are both out of their boxes and running. These printers are a great deal! The setup and instructions could not be easier and the pictures are high quality. No complaints at all. Buy the print pack too so you can just keep on printing and have fun. Fun for all ages from 10 years and up. Even my Mom loves it! If you are using a Cybershot, you will need the card adapter. It accepted the Olympus card without an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: KathAnnon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had been nagging me to print out the thousands of digital pictures I have taken, so I figured I try this little thing out. I have a large format Epson as well as a couple of HP photosmarts, but as everyone who prints knows, it is a real hassle to fire them up and get prints. This little gadget easily and quickly makes 4x6's better than I have ever seen, including the local photolab. Bright, clear, sharp, and glossy. Unlike the previous reviewer, I have had no problem printing right from my 1 gig sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Phil P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, small, portable photo printer
customer_reviews.text: So far this printer is amazing and if the photos last as long as advertised then I'm all about this gizmo especially if it will keep my wife out of the film/camera store! Also the ink seems priced pretty good compared to my other printers. Installation on XP was a cinch and the program that comes with it prints fine although I haven't tried to use any of the editing features yet. I've always bought HP printers but this one may have me sold on Epson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GReat prints expensive ink
customer_reviews.text: I believe Epson prints out the best 4x6 color prints in the market. I'm not too fond of third party inks but a few times I had to purchase them because of the high price of Epson inks. I eventually went back to Epson because of quality concerns. The Epson Picturemate 260(Dash) is a quality machine. I have no problems with the machine or with Epson whatsoever. I've tried uploading to neighborhood stores, that offer one day printing, but the quality of Epson in my opinion cannot be beat. EKavet
customer_reviews.author: E. Kavet

customer_reviews.title: Great photo printer for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I love this little printer! I had always been afraid to print my own at home worrying that the prints wouldn't last, but this epson takes care of that. It is compact, easy to use, and creates beautiful prints. Has lots of nice little features and I love the "paper pack" that includes paper and ink for 100 photos (only comes with a 20 print pack initially). Just a note - the USB cable is not provided, so if you want to use it with your computer remember to buy one or have one on hand.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Epson PictureMare Deluxe
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup. Printing your favorite moments and saving them to cheerish could not be easier. My only comment is that when printing pictures through the use of a USB connection to a computer, the color output displayed on the pc does not necessary reflect to the output on the printed picture. Perhaps it's just me being careless with some of the settings. Overall, very good efficent unit.
customer_reviews.author: G. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this printer for a Christmas present a couple of days before Christmas. It was shipped immediately and I actually received it before Christmas which was a pleasent surprise. We didn't really expect much from this type of printer because of the size and low cost. Well, our expectations were blown away. This prints some awesome looking pictures. So good in fact that people who we give the prints to ask where we take them to get them done. On top of the great print quality this printer is nice and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cook

customer_reviews.title: Received it and ink was outdated and the cost for ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it and ink was outdated and the cost for it and the paper is crazy i have not gotten the chance to use it
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Printer is not printing clearly - line straight down - ...
customer_reviews.text: Printer is not printing clearly - line straight down - cleaned printhead four times and still persists. It is not picking up the print paper properly - sticks constantly and is extremely slow
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The best home printer I have tried but some professional printing is still better
customer_reviews.text: This printer is flat out for the money the best little printer you can buy. In a side by side comparison to snapfish I would say that snapfish produces a slightly sharper image than is made with this printer, however it blows the doors off wal-mart or costco prints. You also can't beat how easy it is to use this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with hesitation. I never got good quality photos from my computer printer and did not enjoy digital photography because of it. It far exceeded my expectations. You would never know the photos are not from a developer. It is easy to use with many options. You can actually view and edit the photo before you print. You can add frames. Yet, it is portable enough to take with you on vacations. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Timber

customer_reviews.title: but I would not recommend purchasing this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: In there noted comments (that was found inside the box) about this product it was stated that it may not work with some SD card, so use at your own risk. So before we open up this product we sent it back. No problem with them refunding our money. They were very understanding, but I would not recommend purchasing this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Byron O. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Epson Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: Once again, Epson has developed a fine product. This very User-friendly photo printer has a plethora of capabilities to ensure the print meets the expectations of the User. It is compact, of course, and its excellent portability makes it a "Must-Have" for the enthusiast who wants to produce prints for friends within minutes of the takes at any venue. Super item at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have only printed one batch of pictures so far but worked great with no issues. I printed from my computer. I did have the HP photo printer that finally quit working. The HP would drive me crazy with photo card insertion problems and this seemed to work much better. The photo colors came out great! I am not sure about the print cartridge as it seems specialized compared to the HP standard cartridges. The print cartridge is about the width of the printer with all colors in one cartridge. I haven't priced a replacement yet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Slate

customer_reviews.title: Incredible photos!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is so easy to set up and use. Even my in-laws were able to do it on their own, which is a real accomplishment! The pictures are remarkable! It prints quickly and is small so doesn't take up a lot of space. It's also portable which is awesome! I love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: JlF

customer_reviews.title: Great little photo printer!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this little photo printer and have been very impressed with the quality of photo prints. One thing I did read in a couple of past reviews was how it was not able to read from 2gb SD cards. It absolutely will read 2gb SD cards as I use one in my Nikon D80 camera and it reads it with no problems. Maybe a little slow but it does read it just the same. In case it matters, I wanted to set the record straight.
customer_reviews.author: Ac4gators

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little printer!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT ... it runs and runs and runs .... day after day, year after year .... LOVE IT!! Just be sure to use Epson paper only.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Jeneen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Epson Picturemate Printer for my husband for his birthday, along with a Canon digital camera. This printer is fantastic. The pictures are actually better than the ones we received from the drugstore developer. We have used this photo printer over and over for instant pictures to give to friends and family of special occasions and fun shots that were captured.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sigman

customer_reviews.title: descent quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pics are good using this printer. It's pretty basic and easy to use. If you are not technology friendly, this is a good place for you to start. The features are not hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Mather

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer!
customer_reviews.text: I already had one, I needed another. It's exactly what one needs on the road. Can even use it with a battery. Pop the CF card in the slot and start printing. Very useful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Photo Gal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Printer
customer_reviews.text: Without getting all technical this printer is fabulous. Easy to use for the beginer to the experienced. Pictures come out beautiful, price is great-what more can I say. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: GRodgers

customer_reviews.title: EPSON PICTUREMATE DELUXE
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST PURCHASE I HAVE MADE RECENTLY. I AM AN AVID PHOTO PERSON. THIS EPSON PRINTS PICTURE AS GOOD AS THE PHOTO LAB. IT WAS SO IMPRESSIVE THAT MY DAUGHTER ALSO PURCHASED ONE FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: J. SECREST

customer_reviews.title: Great Photos
customer_reviews.text: This little printer does one thing and does it very well, it prints pictures. I bought it for my wife to print her photos. I find that I'm using it more than her!
customer_reviews.author: J. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Super old edition and I cant' get the ink locally ...
customer_reviews.text: Super old edition and I cant' get the ink locally from Walmart or bestbuy. I haven't been able to utilize it at all. I bought the ink that was suggested when I made the original purchase and it wasn't the correct ink.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A great little printer
customer_reviews.text: I read quite a few of the reviews before deciding to purchase this little printer. I will have to say that it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pictures Rock
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer .. so much so, I purchased a second as a gift for a friend. It's intuitive to use, the pictures are print house quality and it can go anywhere. I plan on getting the car charger to have it when we take driving vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Hiking Hacker

customer_reviews.title: portable and works well
customer_reviews.text: This printer is very portable and it produces nice prints. I forget what CNET gave it, but it was favorable, so I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as she loves to print pictures. She had problems with printing pictures from her computer so I gave her the Epson pituremate for a gift. It was not long until she was a picture printing machine herself. She loves it. Easy to use and can take most newer memory cards , usb ect,
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures - Poor Hardware Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer 10 months ago after reading the reviews which all seemed great. I've always been an HP fan. Great product?....Give it some time. My printer has never been moved from its original location. It has developed blue blocks of color on everything despite numerous attempts at cleaning, aligning, cartridge changes, etc. When I contacted Epson tech support they sent a document on how to clean, align, and change the cartridges. It's not worth the hassle of sending it 40 miles to a service center. HP is looking better all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: I has one before just like it, so I knew what it could do. I have used it several times and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: MARY LAFORE

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I gave my college age nephew this printer for christmas and he is very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G

customer_reviews.title: Epson Picture Mate Deluxe
customer_reviews.text: The Epson Picture Mate deluxe is a wonderful product for everyone. I use it at home, work, and everywhere I go with my camera or portable stick drive. The viewing window makes it extremely wonderful because it allows the person to view, pick and edit your picture before printing. I highly recommend to anyone who is a picture enthusiatist close to home or traveling. Especially to those who love to catch the moment. Diana Summers
customer_reviews.author: Diana Summers

customer_reviews.title: Epson PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition
customer_reviews.text: We love the printer and it produces great photos, but it will not recognize SDHC memory cards. I emailed Epson and they never did answer back. I still would like to know why it will not recognize these cards.
customer_reviews.author: hwmorris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Printer and prints
customer_reviews.text: I received this printer for Christmas (yesterday) and found the prints exceptionally clear, crisp and beautiful. I am thrilled with the results and highly recommend this printer for its compactness, ease of use, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: EosforJW

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy
customer_reviews.text: This photo printer is so easy to use and the pictures are very clear. Had mine up and running in about ten minutes. Sure beats my old photo printer hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W. Harper

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Print quality was bad, I could not fix it nor enhance the quality of the photo. At the present time have the PictureMate PM260 and this one I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Kates

customer_reviews.title: it is great
customer_reviews.text: it is great and the best printer i have ever had and better then the first one i had thanks bruce planehpn@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product - great purchase sourse through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: M. Herr

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea on average with averything factored in
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7th printer! needless to say, Its proven quality and considering all the pics I print, I shouldnt dropped the last one to get to this machine! At some point for backup I catch another DEAL, i will purchase Again! I like the idea on average with averything factored in, Pics are printed for less than 15 cents a Flick for a 4 by six! sad to say I see why Polaroid and Fuji film no longer offer type 100 669 690 108 type color film! I will be more careful with this printer!
customer_reviews.author: leapjockey

customer_reviews.title: awsome product
customer_reviews.text: this printer is the best that we have found we use it at the office to do passprt photos and it is so easy to print pictures for the family .
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully the condition of sale...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it even one star is because I've owned this printer in the past and it is very good...when it arrives new in working order. Mine, despite saying it was NEW arrived in a badly beaten box, scratched, with a vivtar camera User Guide stuck in the box. After pulling it out and plugging it in, it did turn on but did not read any media (I tried 4 SD cards and USB).
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the HP Photosmart D7360 because it does everything but my daughter likes this one for her expert photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Lynn Paolillo

customer_reviews.title: ... the spot pictures but quality and cost are much better at the local Walgreens
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for on the spot pictures but quality and cost are much better at the local Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: CBGonetotheDogs

customer_reviews.title: Epson PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: The product is just what I needed for a large (~100) group, and produced excellent prints. The seller delivered exactly what was described, along with with a full ink cartridge and photo paper, and on time. Five stars for the seller!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Hooker

customer_reviews.title: bad, very bad.
customer_reviews.text: This was something that stopped working very quickly.Bad printing quality came on early. I took the ink cart out to check and then the ink cart wouldnt go back in. i bought another ink cart,still the same.except this time the ink cover fell off when i tried to press it in a little more tougher. Does it take a rocket scientist to figure this out? i wouldnt think so. mine was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kay Hill

customer_reviews.title: not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer two months ago and have been pretty disappointed. Some pictures print really well but I can't seem to get a narrow blue band to go away at the top of photos now no matter how many times I clean the nozzle. I would not recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: b.d. man

customer_reviews.title: Shopper
customer_reviews.text: The product was listed as like new, it should have been rated good or fair. The door to insert the SD card was very loose. It didn't print anything at all on the first try. I had had one of these before so I knew how to do maintenance on it and I did get it working, but I had to use about half an ink cartridge to get it working. It is a good product, it just was not in like new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

product_meta.title: Epson PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition Photo Printer
product_meta.description:
Epson Picturemate Dlx 4X6 Pri

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer The PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition takes the personal photo lab one step further, making it even easier to view, edit, and print glossy 4x6 photos at an everyday low price. Packed with many additional PC-free photo printing features, PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition is all you need to get brilliant fade-proof photos.

 

Convenient PictureMate Print Packs
With both photo cartridge and paper  View photos in crystal-clear detail on the premium photo viewer. Then, print using superior 6-color archival pigment inks, for photos that will stay brilliant for years longer than any other digital printing option. In fact, they outlast traditional film-processed photos as much as 2-4 times longer. And, they last longer than prints from other dedicated 4x6 photo printers by as much as 25 times.1 All this, and they're even water and smudge-proof for worry-free handling.

 PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition provides an unbeatable value for superior lab quality photos. At around 29 cents per print, it's as affordable as many labs and about half the cost of prints from most other 4x6 photo printers.2 The convenient PictureMate Print Pack, with both photo cartridge and paper, has all you need to print stacks of beautiful photos. The printer initially comes with a starter photo cartridge and 20 sheets of paper. Thereafter, you'll purchase PictureMate Print Packs, which contain 100 sheets of paper and a photo ink cartridge with an approximate 100-page yield.

 PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition is the perfect accessory for any digital camera, supporting all popular memory cards, plus direct camera printing with PictBridge. Just insert your card, and then use the 2.4-inch adjustable viewer to select your photos, crop or make them lighter or darker, and instantly see your changes on-screen. With a unique Print-by-Date mode, you can even sort through hundreds of photos on large memory cards quickly and easily. In fact, you can print a brilliant 4x6 photo in as fast as 75 seconds.3

 If you wish to use your computer with PictureMate, it is Windows and Macintosh compatible. PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition also supports an optional internal battery, for improved portability. Take home PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition today, and find out for yourself why it's so easy to trust your memories to PictureMate.

 

 What's in the Box
PictureMate Deluxe Viewer Edition, power cord, starter PictureMate photo cartridge, 20 sheets of PictureMate Photo Paper, CD-ROM, user manuals; Epson Software Film Factory (PC and Macintosh compatible, P.I.M. and Exif Print-enabled); USB cable not included

 Notes
1 Using the PictureMate cartridge and PictureMate paper, prints can last up to 200 years in archival sleeves in album storage and up to 100 years in a glass frame in indoor display conditions. See Wilhelm-research.com for test conditions. Actual print stability will vary according to image and storage or display conditions. Epson does not guarantee the longevity of prints.
2 PictureMate Print Pack includes a PictureMate Photo Cartridge and 100 sheets of glossy 4" x 6" PictureMate Photo Paper.
3 Speed based on printing a color photo without a PC in border layout mode. Additional processing time will vary based on system configuration, software application and page complexity.
feature_bullets: Premium 2.4-inch photo viewer for selecting and editing images
PC-free photo printing from all popular digital camera memory cards
Photos as brilliant and affordable as lab prints, but last 2-4 times longer
Water, smudge and fade-proof prints with up to 200-year album life
More photo options, including mini-wallets, fun Disney borders, and BorderFree

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars165 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
